attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bring back Democracy.
Are you one of the many individuals who have decided not to vote, the ones that are called complacent by the politicians? Maybe like most of us you would like to see our elected representatives really govern! Restore power to members of the House of Commons and those who voted for them. I call upon all parties to stop abdicating their decision making to unelected quangos.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/regionalquangos/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
